msquerybuilderbackend.repository

Interface AlertRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Alert,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.GraphRepository<Alert>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Alert,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Alert,java.lang.Long>

    public interface AlertRepository
extends org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.GraphRepository<Alert>
    Repository for the alert objects in the neo4j database
    Author:
    Martin

        @Query(value="MATCH (a:Alert) return a.name")
java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNames()
        queries all names of the alerts
        Returns:

      • getAllAlerts

        @Query(value="MATCH (a:Alert) return a")
java.util.List<Alert> getAllAlerts()
        queries all alerts from the neo4j database
